Dear Attorney General Bondi: As the former Chairman of the       Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs, as well as the       Representative of Wyoming, home of the Wind River Reservation       and the Eastern Shoshone and Northern Arapaho tribes, I am       writing to thank the Department of Justice (DOJ) for renewing       its efforts to prioritize public safety and justice       throughout Indian Country.
